subject: Automobile Racing
Accidents and Safety
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After imploring drivers to be more aggressive on the racetrack this season to help rebuild fading fan support, Nascar issued a probation to Carl Edwards.
snippet: After imploring drivers to be more aggressive on the racetrack this season to help rebuild fading fan support, Nascar issued a probation to Carl Edwards.
